title: Define Project Requirements
description: Compile a comprehensive list of detailed requirements for the AI-powered war game system. This includes functional and non-functional requirements, user stories, acceptance criteria, ethical and legal considerations related to the use of AI in military applications, data privacy and security measures for sensitive military data, potential risks and mitigation strategies, as well as guidelines for responsible AI usage in the context of military simulations. The initial architecture design will be based on the gathered requirements and should include a clear breakdown of frontend, backend, and database components, with emphasis on scalability, performance, and security considerations. This task is further divided into several sub-tasks to ensure comprehensive coverage. Upon completion, each sub-task will be documented and submitted for review and approval. To facilitate efficient collaboration and decision-making, it would be beneficial to establish a working group consisting of relevant stakeholders including but not limited to subject matter experts, developers, security professionals, legal advisors, and project manager. Once the requirements are gathered and the initial design is approved, assign the task to the code-architect for further development. In order to ensure progress and address any arising issues in a timely manner, regular meetings should be scheduled with the working group. To document the progress and discuss the findings, create a shared workspace or wiki page where all relevant documents can be stored and updated in real time. Upon completion of each sub-task, update this RFC with the link to the corresponding documentation for review and approval.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integration points.

title: Develop AI Models
description: Research, develop, and train AI models for simulating military scenarios, decision-making, and analysis.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for setting up war game scenarios, visualizing simulations, and analyzing results.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for storing and retrieving war game scenarios, simulation results, and other relevant data.

title: Develop Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure the system's integrity and protect sensitive data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the system.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system's quality and reliability.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
